version_description:
full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.2.35/CHANGELOG.md

- You can now create multiple montage profiles and save them!
- ability to pin monitors when rearranging montage
- fixes a bug for first time users where app freezes if APIs are not working
- Event archive/unarchive (swipe from right to left)
- Ability to see motion outlines (if enabled and working in ZM)

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.2.36/CHANGELOG.md

Key features

- You can now cycle between montage profiles automatically
- View zone layers (view only, not edit)
- New language: Dutch
The previous version broke Wizard and also seems  to have cause HTTP access issues for some. This version fixes both.

full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.2.38/CHANGELOG.md

- It looks like for iOS users, video playback (for folks on the video/h264 branch) broke due to some security changes that conflicted with iOS 10.2.1

- You can now disable GIF and MP4 generation in the event list allowing for quicker scroll (useful if you don't really use these features) - setting in dev options

- In the 'logs' view, you can now switch between zmNinja and ZM logs

Full Changelog https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.2.40/CHANGELOG.md
- mostly a bug fix release, plus German as a new language

Full Changelog https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.2.41/CHANGELOG.md

Implemented enhancements:
- Implement concept of 'default profile' & 'workspace' in Montage #509
- Allow for montage scaling at increments of 5% (currently 10%) #505
- In monitor list (Montage screen) make the color of disabled monitors more prominent #503

Fixed bugs:
- Montage profile showing new monitors automatically #504
- Video playback (h264) breaks on iOS with a config.xml setting #501

Full changelog https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.2.503/CHANGELOG.md

- iOS 11 tweaks
- Montage cycle is now customizable
- New language: Hungarian
- Various bug fixes

This is a maintenance release
Version 1.2.503 broke the timeline view - this release fixes it (the problem was due to an incompatible library update).
If you are still facing timeline issues, please send me an email.

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.2.507/CHANGELOG.md

- iphone X support
- fixed memory leak for long running montage
- optimizations to PTZ UI for small screens

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.2.513/CHANGELOG.md

- Events list will now show thumbnails (needs API update - read http://bit.ly/2kovqQH)
- If you are using Push, you need to update your push server - read http://bit.ly/2kovqQH)
- Various bug fixes

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.2.515/CHANGELOG.md

- New 24 hr preview feature (see http://bit.ly/2APOnSw) NEEDS API Update!
- Push notifications can now be configured to directly play the event
- many bug fixes (related to many areas - please see full changelog)

- Lots of new updates in 1.3 - read https://medium.com/zmninja/what-to-expect-in-zmninja-1-3-5741fac8b13e for more details
- Full 1.3 CHANGELOG - https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.3.002/CHANGELOG.md

- 1.3.003 fixes a bug where certain devices can't store data
- 1.3.002 fixes a bug where an API error was shown even if portal login was ok
- 1.3.001 fixes a bug with 1.3.000 where live view stopped working without authentication
This release fixes an issue where the montage screen shows green dots when you resume the app from the background

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.3.011/CHANGELOG.md

Key Notes:

- Dev options allow you to change % of montage scaling to optimize window to screen spacing
- Support new ZM 1.32.0 login APIs
- Various other bug fixes
This release fixes a bug that certain users with ZM 1.30.4 were facing while trying to login, which resulted in authentication failure
- Fixes an issue where people could not login when they are using their own certificates

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.3.016/CHANGELOG.md

Summary:
- fix for fallback getting stuck
- various other bug fixes (See full changelog)
- Fixes login issues when a user is using a locally generated self signed cert (please re-install if update doesn't work)

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.3.050/CHANGELOG.md

- Event list updates dynamically
- Show object detection frames inside zmNinja (needs ES/Machine learning)
- Event Montage reworked to show both JPEG and Video events and fix issues
- Various bug fixes

Maintenance release
- fixes state control bug
- wizard fixes

IMPORTANT: Please make sure ZM has AUTH RELAY set to hashed and AUTH HASH LOGIN enabled

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/tree/v1.3.065

- Support for ZM 1.34 new token system (much faster)
- Montage Bling: Unseen events, event playback, event details
- lots of bug fixes, see full changeling

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.3.070/CHANGELOG.md

Key features:

- Kiosk Mode
- Gapless playback for video events
- various bug fixes (see detailed changelog)

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.3.078/CHANGELOG.md

Fixed bugs:

Timescale logic is wrong for filtering everywhere #848
No exit event view option on iOS v1.3.070 release #839

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.3.079/CHANGELOG.md

Implemented enhancements:

- Hide buttons and controls in live/events view if you single tap (toggle on off on tap) #854
- Other bug fixes

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.3.082/CHANGELOG.md
(see https://medium.com/zmninja/api-cache-faster-montage-vertical-timeline-scrolling-and-more-4c8c2b2a500b for more details)

Key enhancements
- API Caching
- Faster montage loading via low res images first

Various bugs fixed

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.3.085/CHANGELOG.md

Implemented enhancements:

- Add custom header & id to zmninja (X-ZmNinja/id=) #876
- zmNinja Filter Event input dialog ignores system date & time formats #875

Fixed bugs:

- Thumbnails on Events List being displayed with incorrect aspect ratio #872
- browser links don't work on iOS 13+ #869
- Last row in timeline view layout pushes thumbnail off the screen #866

Full CHANGELOG: https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.3.088/CHANGELOG.md

Implemented enhancements:
- Add swedish language #892

Fixed bugs:
- live streams do not recover after monitors crash #901
- Configuration wizard appears fails - uses old credentials when new tokens are available #900
- montage sporadic freezes (possibly triggered by unstable RTSP) #894
- others

Maintenance release
Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.3.089/CHANGELOG.md

Fixed bugs:

- Push notifications don't take the app to the screen designated in ES Settings #903
- Navigating/scrubbing timeline for playback does not work over red motion indicators #897

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.3.091/CHANGELOG.md
Fixed bugs:

Montage screen often doesn't load monitors #908


Closed issues:

ZM APi not working #907
Change the layout of the montage page? #905
High value on AUTH_HASH_TTL in zoneminder gives zmninja auth timeout problems #893

- Minor maintenance updates
Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.3.096/CHANGELOG.md

- Fixes a bug where the status bar would overlap with the app
- Fixes a bug where it would identify itself as a desktop application and not register push notifications

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.4.3/CHANGELOG.md

Implemented enhancements:
- New language: Simplified Chinese #925

Fixed bugs:

- ZM Authentication settings does not update user restricted monitors #926
- iOS push registration not working (identifies as desktop) #922
- Double encoded URLs #920
- iPadOS 13.4 header icons/controls overlay OS Time/date/battery etc. #919

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.4.004/CHANGELOG.md

Implemented enhancements:

- Add option to hide footers in montage #931
- Allow automatic distribution in montage based on number of columns #930

Fixed bugs:

- 1.4.3 encode URL seems broken on mobile devices - event filters don't work (Event/24 hr filters etc) #933
This version fixes an issue in 1.4.004 which causes ZM 1.32.x users to not be able to access monitors

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.4.007/CHANGELOG.md

Key features

- ZM group support (needs new APIs)
- Montage auto flow
- Video playback skip +-10s

Read more at https://medium.com/zmninja/1-4-007-and-some-updates-6e67e306f221?source=collection_home---4------0-----------------------

Full CHANGELOG https://github.com/pliablepixels/zmNinja/blob/v1.4.009/CHANGELOG.md

Implemented enhancements:
- Add ability to force MJPEG streaming per monitor #951

Fixed bugs:
- 1.4.3 encode URL seems broken at least on iOS (Event/24 hr filters etc) #933
